nodes.speaker: Elder
nodes.text: Ah, you've come. I was hoping you would.

nodes.speaker: Elder
nodes.text: The time bell has fallen silent. Day and night no longer keep their rhythm.

nodes.speaker: Elder
nodes.text: The crops wither. Shadows grow too long. Our world is losing its balance.

nodes.speaker: Elder
nodes.text: The bell's clapper was removed long ago. It lies hidden in the ruins beyond the fields.

nodes.speaker: Elder
nodes.text: Will you venture into the ruins and retrieve it?

nodes.speaker: Elder
nodes.text: You have my gratitude. Be cautious in the ruins. Time is... unstable there.

nodes.speaker: Elder
nodes.text: The clapper guards a sealed memory from our village's founding.

nodes.speaker: Elder
nodes.text: Do not seek to understand it. Simply return what was taken.

nodes.speaker: Elder
nodes.text: Thank you. The village depends on you.

nodes.speaker: Elder
nodes.text: Return the clapper to me when you find it. I will restore the bell's song.

nodes.speaker: Elder
nodes.text: Have you retrieved the clapper from the ruins?

nodes.speaker: Elder
nodes.text: Be careful. The ruins hold more than just the clapper.

nodes.speaker: Elder
nodes.text: You have done well. Give it to me.
(This leads to the ending choice scene)
